question: Read the following and choose the true statement about the Pradhan Mantri MUDRA Yojana scheme. 1. The PMMY Scheme was launched in April, 2015. 2. Mudra Loans are not available for non-agricultural activities.
explanation: The PMMY Scheme was launched in April, 2015. Mudra Loans are available for non-agricultural activities up to Rs. 10 lakh .The activities allied to agriculture such as Dairy, Poultry, Bee Keeping etc, are also covered.
